sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.sidebar-component.fill-height
  v-list(app).px-2.px-sm-3.blue-grey.lighten-4.fill-height.fixed
    v-btn.btn-main.font-weight-bold.text-caption.text-sm-body-2.elevation-3.p-2.pt-1.mt-1.mb-2(
      to="/", active-class="primary darken-1")
      v-icon.grey--text.text--lighten-1.mr-1 mdi-home
      | Главная
    .grey--text.mt-1.mb-n2.text-center.text-h6
      | Каталог:
    v-list-item.px-0
      v-list-item-content
        v-list-item-title
          v-btn.product-btn.font-weight-bold.text-caption.text-sm-body-2.elevation-3.pl-2.pt-1.mb-2(
            :to="tab.route" block v-for="tab in tabs" :key="tab.route", active-class="primary darken-1")
            v-icon.grey--text.text--lighten-1.mr-1 {{ tab.icon }}
            | {{ tab.title }}
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "sidebar-component",

  data: () => ({
    tabs: [
      { title: "Моторы", icon: "mdi-engine", route: "/motors" },
      { title: "Пропеллеры", icon: "mdi-current-ac", route: "/propellers" },
      { title: "Стартеры", icon: "mdi-cog-clockwise", route: "/starters" },
    ]
  })
}
</script>

<style>
.btn-main {
  width: 100%;
}

.product-btn {
  justify-content: left;
}

.fixed {
  position: fixed;
}
</style>
